actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to repeal sections 1151-1170, inclusive, establishing Professional Standards Review Organizations to review health services.

summary.text: Repeals, under the Social Security Act, the provisions for the establishment of Professional Standards Review Organizations to review services covered under the medicare and medicaid programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to repeal sections 1151-1170, inclusive, establishing Professional Standards Review Organizations to review health services.
